asset.hookText:
In this video, Chef Matthew Lightner, Executive Chef, Atera showcases his Pro Move: Fan-Dried Duck.

Learn more about Breville:

So it becomes one with the skin then we break it comes very very nice and very uniform. In about '45 minutes and the dryness and the lacquer is right about where we want. It's almost time to go into the oven. It's about 350 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes.
